mapper.insert: insert into Table_Chat_History ( loginUserId, elderUserId, questId, defineQuestId, quest, userVoiceUrl, voicequest, questDate ) values ( #{loginUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{elderUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defineQuestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userVoiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voicequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Table_chat_history LEFT JOIN Table_login_user ON Table_login_user.Id = Table_chat_history.loginUserId LEFT JOIN Table_elder_user ON Table_elder_user.elderUserId=Table_chat_history.elderUserId Where Table_chat_history.elderUserId=#{elderUserId} AND (Table_chat_history.responseDate is null or Table_chat_history.responseDate ='') order by questDate

SELECT * FROM Table_chat_history LEFT JOIN Table_login_user ON Table_login_user.Id = Table_chat_history.loginUserId LEFT JOIN Table_elder_user ON Table_elder_user.elderUserId=Table_chat_history.elderUserId Where Table_chat_history.chatId=#{chatId}

SELECT *
FROM Table_chat_history LEFT JOIN Table_login_user ON Table_login_user.Id = Table_chat_history.loginUserId LEFT JOIN Table_elder_user ON Table_elder_user.elderUserId=Table_chat_history.elderUserId LEFT JOIN table_collection ON table_collection.chatId = Table_chat_history.chatId AND table_collection.loginUserId=#{loginUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE Table_chat_history.elderUserId = #{elderUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and (Table_chat_history.quest like concat('%',#{search},'%') or Table_chat_history.elderUserResponse like concat('%',#{search},'%'))
and Table_chat_history.chatid in (select chatid from table_collection where table_collection.loginUserId=#{loginUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
